title: The red and blue flood line, if shown on the Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal shall stand modified as and when it is modified by the Irrigation Department
clause_text: The red and blue flood line, if shown on the Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal shall stand modified as and when it is modified by the Irrigation Department.
section: Construction within Blue and Red Flood Line

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
